channel.title: independent broker-dealer on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in independent broker-dealer on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
LPL Financial Logo
LPL Financial Holdings, Inc. was founded in 1989 and is considered the largest independent broker-dealer in the United States. As of 2021 the company had more than 17,200 financial advisors, over $903 billion in advisory & brokerage assets, and generated approximately $5.9 billion in annual revenue for the 2020 fiscal year. LPL Financial was formed in 1989 through the merger of two brokerage firms—Linsco and Private Ledger—and has since expanded its number of independent financial advisors both organically and through acquisitions.
You can download theLPL Financiallogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: LPL Financial
item.description: LPL Financial Holdings, Inc. was founded in 1989 and is considered the largest independent broker-dealer in the United States. As of 2021 the company had more than 17,200 financial advisors, over $903 billion in advisory & brokerage assets, and generated approximately $5.9 billion in annual revenue for the 2020 fiscal year. LPL Financial was formed in 1989 through the merger of two brokerage firms—Linsco and Private Ledger—and has since expanded its number of independent financial advisors both organically and through acquisitions.
